meanings.definition: The quality or state of being congruous.
meanings.sent1: The congruousnesses of the colors in the painting made it pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The congruousnesses of their opinions led to a successful collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The congruousnesses of the mismatched socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The congruousnesses of nature and technology in the artwork were thought-provoking.
meanings.sent5: The congruousnesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.

meanings.definition: The state of being in agreement or harmony.
meanings.sent1: Their congruousnesses on the project ensured its smooth completion.
meanings.sent2: The congruousnesses between the team members improved productivity.
meanings.sent3: The congruousnesses of the music and the dance moves were delightful to watch.
meanings.sent4: The congruousnesses of the flavors in the dish created a perfect balance.
meanings.sent5: The congruousnesses of the family's traditions brought them closer together.

meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The congruousnesses of her outfit for the occasion impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The congruousnesses of his words in that situation calmed the situation.
meanings.sent3: The congruousnesses of the unexpected gift made her day.
meanings.sent4: The congruousnesses of the actor for the role were evident in the performance.
meanings.sent5: The congruousnesses of the font style with the design enhanced the poster.
